IMesh

IMesh is simply a collection of submesh objects (ISubMesh).

NOTE: This mesh is different from a renderable mesh. There is a function MeshToD3D which will convert the mesh into a renderable mesh.

Functions

Ray3& ray,
RayIntersect3* pIntersection,
uint32* pMaterialID
) = 0

Parameters
